div.ab: This is good for the red [in the eyes], and they(?) are hurting: Take root of fennel and piterlen(?) and paplan(?) and crush it and put the juice from it three drops in the eye with a bottle. When he wants to lay down (to sleep?), so will he be healed, certainly, and tested.
To heal problems(?) of the eyes: Take honey, water mint and draw(???) it through a cloth/rag and put it in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly, in three days, without a doubt.

One who has(?) bad scabies/scab, he must take bean flour and he must boil [it] in white whine that is good and he must put it on a cloth and must lay it on the head. So will his healing certainly be completed(???), tested and tried.
